text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump The Coronavirus outbreak shows how important to have an actual leader in the WH. Your daddy is clueless, and his lack of appropriate action is endangering the health of countless people. He is even lying about how many confirmed cases we have in the US. #RightMatters
